typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TransformedCustomer
source(output(
		{Cliente ID} as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtratedCustomer
TransformedCustomer, ExtratedCustomer join(TransformedCustomer@{Cliente ID} == ExtratedCustomer@{Cliente ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{Cliente ID} = TransformedCustomer@{Cliente ID},
		Nombre,
		Apellido,
		Segmento,
		Pais,
		Ciudad,
		Estado,
		{Codigo Postal},
		Region
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataToStore
DataToStore keyGenerate(output(Pk_Cliente as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKeyCliente
SurrogateKeyCliente sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Cliente as integer,
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		Region as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['delete from [DIM_Cliente]'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Cliente = Pk_Cliente,
		Cliente_ID = {Cliente ID},
		Nombre,
		Apellido,
		Segmento,
		Pais,
		Ciudad,
		Estado,
		Region,
		{Codigo Postal}
	)) ~> StoreDWHCustomer

source(output(
		{Detalle Orden} as integer,
		{Numero Orden} as string,
		{Producto ID} as integer,
		{Linea Total} as double,
		Cantidad as integer,
		Descuento as double,
		{Precio Unitario} as double,
		Ganancia as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExTLdetallesdeordenes
ExTLdetallesdeordenes select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 keyGenerate(output(PK_detalledeordenes as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		PK_DetalleOrden as integer,
		PK_Order as integer,
		Detalle_Orden as string,
		Linea_Total as double,
		Cantidad as decimal(18,5),
		Descuento as decimal(5,5),
		Precio_Unitario as decimal(18,5),
		Ganancia as decimal(18,5),
		PK_Producto as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Almacenarproducto

source(output(
		num_order as string,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		modo_envio as string,
		cliente_id as string,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		region_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TbOrdenes
source(output(
		{@id_modo} as string,
		{@Descripcion} as string,
		{@Tipo_x0020_ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ModoEnvio
source(output(
		{Region ID} as integer,
		{Region Desc} as string,
		{Detalle region} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Regiones
source(output(
		{@id_tipo} as string,
		{@Descripción} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> TipoEnvio
source(output(
		PK_Cliente as integer,
		Cliente_ID as string,
		Nombre as string,
		Apellido as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Pais as string,
		Ciudad as string,
		Estado as string,
		Region as string,
		{Codigo Postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> MapCliente
Join2, ModoEnvio join(modo_envio == {@id_modo},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join3 select(mapColumn(
		num_order,
		fec_orden,
		fec_envio,
		id_modo_envio = modo_envio,
		cliente_id,
		imp_subtotal,
		region_id,
		{Region Desc},
		{Detalle region},
		modo_envio = {@Descripcion},
		id_Tipo_Envio = {@Tipo_x0020_ID},
		Tipo_envio = {@Descripción}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
TbOrdenes, Regiones join(region_id == {Region ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1, TipoEnvio join({@Tipo_x0020_ID} == {@id_tipo},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Select1 keyGenerate(output(PK_Orden as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
MapCliente select(mapColumn(
		PK_Cliente,
		Cliente_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDataCliente
SurrogateKey1, SelectDataCliente join(Select1@cliente_id == SelectDataCliente@Cliente_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join4
Join4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Order as integer,
		num_order as integer,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		imp_subtotal as decimal(18,2),
		id_modo as integer,
		modo_envio as string,
		ID_Tipo_envio as integer,
		descripcion_envio as string,
		Region_ID as integer,
		Region_descripcion as string,
		Detalle_Region as string,
		PK_Cliente as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Order = PK_Orden,
		num_order,
		fec_orden,
		fec_envio,
		imp_subtotal,
		id_modo = id_modo_envio,
		modo_envio,
		ID_Tipo_envio = id_Tipo_Envio,
		descripcion_envio = Tipo_envio,
		Region_ID = region_id,
		Region_descripcion = {Region Desc},
		Detalle_Region = {Detalle region},
		PK_Cliente
	)) ~> StoreTable

source(output(
		{Producto ID} as string,
		{Numero Producto} as string,
		{Producto Sub Categoria ID} as string,
		{Nombre Producto} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTProduct
source(output(
		{Subcategoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Categoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Descripcion Subcategoria} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTProductSubcategory
source(output(
		{Categoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Descripcion Categoria} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTCategory
ExtLTProduct, ExtLTProductSubcategory join({Producto Sub Categoria ID} == {Subcategoria Producto ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSubcategory
JoinSubcategory, ExtLTCategory join(ExtLTProductSubcategory@{Categoria Producto ID} == ExtLTCategory@{Categoria Producto ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'both')~> JoinCategory
JoinCategory select(mapColumn(
		{Producto ID},
		{Numero Producto},
		{Producto Sub Categoria ID},
		{Nombre Producto},
		{Subcategoria Producto ID},
		{Categoria Producto ID} = ExtLTProductSubcategory@{Categoria Producto ID},
		{Descripcion Subcategoria},
		{Categoria Producto ID} = ExtLTCategory@{Categoria Producto ID},
		{Descripcion Categoria}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 keyGenerate(output(Pk_Producto as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Producto as integer,
		Producto_ID as integer,
		Descripcion_Subcategoria as string,
		Numero_Producto as string,
		Categoria_ID as string,
		Nombre_Producto as string,
		Descripcion_Categoria as string,
		Subcategoria_ID as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['delete from DIM_Producto'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Producto = Pk_Producto,
		Producto_ID = {Producto ID},
		Descripcion_Subcategoria = {Descripcion Subcategoria},
		Numero_Producto = {Numero Producto},
		Categoria_ID = {Categoria Producto ID},
		Nombre_Producto = {Nombre Producto},
		Descripcion_Categoria = {Descripcion Categoria},
		Subcategoria_ID = {Subcategoria Producto ID}
	)) ~> AlmacenarProducto

source(output(
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		{Region ID} as integer,
		Target as decimal(18,5)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtTargetTable
ExtTargetTable keyGenerate(output(PK_Metas as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AgregarSurrogateKey
AgregarSurrogateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Meta as integer,
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		Region_ID as integer,
		TARGET as decimal(18,5)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Truncate Table DIM_Metas'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Meta = PK_Metas,
		{Año},
		Mes,
		Region_ID = {Region ID},
		TARGET = Target
	)) ~> AlmacenarMetasDWH
